title: Inclusive Design of Digital Training Systems: Application in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage skills and foundational language learning abilities
context.additional_context: Goal of improving language practical skills in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners improve language task performance by over 30% using an adaptive feedback system on digital platforms
Learners apply 50 language expressions reflecting cultural contexts to practical projects via a multilingual interface
Learners develop inclusive communication strategies through peer assessment in mobile environments with accessibility features

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
